newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Thakral gets Singapore OHQ status.
newsitem.headline: Thakral gets Singapore OHQ status.

text.p: Consumer electronic products distributor Thakral Corp said on Friday it had been conferred Operational Headquarters (OH) status by the Economic Development Board of Singapore.
The status gives Thakral a concessionary corporate tax rate of 10 percent for an initial period of five years.

The company said it had also received a grant of Singapore $1.4 million from Singapore's National Science and Technology Board which it intends to use to support the development of its video CD and digital video disc (DVD) players which will be manufactured at its plant in Shanghai.
